properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 v5 c2 v6 c2 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aa dinamulalo devokthi arudaayenu Devuni vaartha aa dinamulalo devokthi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daivokthi pratyakshatha dorukunade arudaayenata aa dinamulalo devokthi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ishraayeleeyula kaanaadu ye raaju leka poye Thana istaanu saaramugaa thirugu chundenu prathivaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parama thandri mandasamu cherapattabadi nanduna prabhaavamu poyenu Prabhuni prajalalo nundi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daaveedantha kanthaku dina dinamu vardhillenu Sainyamu ladhipathi Yehovaa sarvadaa thana thodai yunden{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Solomonarpinchina balula nagni kaalchagane Prabhuni aalaya manthayu prabhavamutho nindenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lemmu thejarillumu neeku velugu kaligenu Yehovaa thandri mahima nee meeda nudayinchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa pattanamani ishraayelu parishudda devuni sionani neeku peru pettedaru{/lang-eng}
